Description.Text: The FOMITHEA HOTELS is a Tourist hotel. Located in Beach area. Shopping is accessible by bus/taxi and the nightlife/restaurants are easily accessible by taxi or bus from the hotel.

Set on the breathtaking Greek Island of Santorini, the Syrigos Fomithea Hotel is the prefect destination for anybody in search of sun, sea and sand. Here in the sleepy resort of Kamari, you%u2019ll be able to bask in the beautiful sunshine, or swim in the crystal clear waters of the Aegean Sea. There are some great water sports on offer in the area, and the town of Kamari boasts a range of shops, bars and restaurants.The Syrigos Fomithea Hotel features a total of 28 rooms, all of which come fitted with the height of modern comforts and amenities. Guests can enjoy satellite television, wireless Internet, direct-dial telephones, and even facilities for making tea and coffee. Air-conditioning is provided throughout the property, and all rooms feature spacious en-suite bathrooms. Other facilities provided at the Syrigos Fomithea Hotel include safety deposit boxes in the reception area, luggage storage, a well-tended garden, and a range of small on-site shops. You%u2019ll be able to get currency exchanged at the hotel%u2019s reception desk, as well being able to hire cars and bikes in the area.
